modShortDescription: It provides 25% boost to headshots at a difficulty of 2, and also scales the damage to headshots based on the difficulty of the game.
modDescription:
TSBX removed the 25% Headshot that ShoudenKalferas was using from [his modlet collection](https://7daystodiemods.com/headshot-multiplier/). So ShoudenKalferas copied and revised the code a bit. It provides 25% boost to headshots at a difficulty of 2, and also scales the damage to headshots based on the difficulty of the game.

* Difficulty 2 = No change
* Difficulty 3 = 25% Increase
* Difficulty 4 = 35% Increase
* Difficulty 5 = 50% Increase

## Changelog

* **_(new)_** He has re-tuned and lowered all the values of both headshot mods to provide a bit more variety. He also did find that even on the 15% with difficulty 4 that with maxed perks he was too consistently always killing with every headshot.
* Updated for A20.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/XelaNull/7DTD-Bag_Bellows_Headshot/tree/master/Headshot_25)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/17502-60-slot-bag-faster-bellows-25-headshot/).

**Credits:** [ShoudenKalferas](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/shoudenkalferas/), TSBX
